text: Marcelo Oliveira Silva known as Marcelinho (born 10 September 1984) is a Brazilian football player. ==External links== * Profile at official Aalborg BK Website Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Brazilian expatriate footballers Category:Campeonato Brasileiro Série A players Category:Clube Atlético Mineiro players Category:Avaí FC players Category:Primeira Liga players Category:Associação Naval 1º de Maio players Category:Sharjah FC players Category:Al Wahda FC players Category:UAE Pro League players Category:Fluminense FC players Category:Clube Náutico Capibaribe players Category:Brazilian expatriate sportspeople in Portugal Category:Brazilian expatriate sportspeople in the United Arab Emirates Category:Expatriate footballers in Portugal Category:Expatriate footballers in the United Arab Emirates Category:Association football forwards
title: Marcelinho (footballer, born September 1984)
